<xsd:schema jaxb:version="1.0" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/common" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/common" xmlns:jaxb="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This schema defines elements and types that are commonly used across different workflow services.</xsd:documentation> <xsd:appinfo> <jaxb:schemaBindings> <jaxb:package name="oracle.bpel.services.workflow.common.model"/> </jaxb:schemaBindings> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:element name="workflowContext" type="workflowContextType"/> <xsd:complexType name="workflowContextType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="credential" type="credentialType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="token" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="locale" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="timeZone" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="credential" type="credentialType"/> <xsd:complexType name="credentialType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="login" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="password" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="identityContext" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="onBehalfOfUser" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="participant" type="principleRefType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Definition of a participant (a user, group or application role)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="principleRefType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="realm" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If participantType is USER or GROUP, this property may be used to identify the identity service realm for this participant. If the participantType is APPROLE, this property may be used to identify the name of the application thte role belongs to.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="type" type="participantTypeEnum" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="principleListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="participant" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="participantTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="USER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GROUP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="APPROLE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/task" jaxb:version="1.0" elementFormDefault="qualified" blockDefault="#all" xmlns:tns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/task" schemaLocation="http://soa-server:7003//integration/services/TaskQueryService/TaskQueryService?XSD=TaskEvidenceService.xsd"/> <element name="task"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="title" <xsd:documentation>The id of the presentation associated with this view. View presentation stores metadata on how a query should be presented, including columns and ordering. If a view specifies a view presentation id, it should NOT specify columns, viewOrdering or viewOptionalInfo, as these will be defined in the presentation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="viewColumns" type="columnListType"/> <xsd:element name="viewOptionalInfo" type="query:taskOptionalInfoType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="viewPredicate" type="query:taskPredicateType"/> <xsd:element name="viewHistoryPredicate" type="query:predicateType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Optional additional predicate clause, that is applied to all versions of the task/process instance. type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="columnWidth" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:integer"/> <xsd:element name="formatMask" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="columnListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="column" type="columnType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="chartType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="groupByColumn" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="selectValues" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="orderByCount" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:attribute name="ascendingOrder" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="userPreferenceType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="user" type="common:principleRefType"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="xpathExpressionType"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="assigneeType" type="ruleTypeEnum" use="required"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="userApplicationDataType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Representation of generic application data that can be stored for users, groups or application roles.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique (GUID) idenitier for this ApplicationData. Automatically assigned by API when ApplicationData is created.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name identifying this application data. Combination of name, applicationDataType and owner must be unique.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="owner" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the user that owns this application data.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="identityContext" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>identityContext (also called realm) that the owning user belongs to.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="data" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Actual data that is stored by API. This is text of unlimited length, and can be any format (XML, CSV etc.). The UserMetadataService is entirely agnostic to the content of this field. All parsing, validation and processing must be performed by the client.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="grantees" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" type="common:principleListType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>List of users, groups or application roles that this application data has been shared with. Grantees get read-only access to the application data.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="createdDate" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date this application data entry was created. Automatically populated by UserMetadataService API.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="updatedDate" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date this application data entry was last updated. Automatically populated by UserMetadataService API.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="createdBy" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of user that created this application data entry. Automatically populated by UserMetadataService API.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="updatedBy" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of user that updated this application data entry. Automatically populated by UserMetadataService API.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="applicationDataType" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of application data this represents, for example "LAYOUT" or "BAMDASHBOARD". This can be any value - it is up to API clients to define the types of data.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="presentationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Metadata representing how the results of a query should be presented, including which columns should be displayed, how the columns should be formatted, and how the data should be orderd. Presentations can be associated with views, and provide a way of defining a standard presentation of data that can be shared amongst multiple views.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique idenitier for this Presentation. Automatically assigned by API when Presentation is created.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name for this presentation - must be unique to the set of presentations belonging to the same owner. i.e. the combinition of name and owner must be unique.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="owner" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Username of the owner of this Presentation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="identityContext" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>identityContext (also called realm) that the owning user belongs to.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="columns" type="columnListType"/> <xsd:element name="optionalInfo" type="query:taskOptionalInfoType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ordering" minOccurs="0" type="query:taskOrderingType"/> <xsd:element name="grantees" minOccurs="0" type="common:principleListType"/> <xsd:element name="createdDate" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date this Presentation was created. Automatically populated by UserMetadataService API.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="updatedDate" type="xsd:dateTime" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date this Presentation was last updated. Automatically populated by UserMetadataService API.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="createdBy" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of user that created this Presentation. Automatically populated by UserMetadataService API.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="updatedBy" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of user that updated this Presentation. Automatically populated by UserMetadataService API.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="presentationDataType" type="presentationDataTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>What type of data this presentation is intended to format - TASK or PROCESS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ruleEngineEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ORACLE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OTHER"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ruleTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="USER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GROUP"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="viewTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="INBOX"/> <xsd:enumeration value="VIEW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="STANDARD_VIEW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PROCESS_VIEW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="STANDARD_PROCESS_VIEW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REPORT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="grantTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SHARE_DATA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SHARE_DEFINITION"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="actionTypeEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="NOOPERATION"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REASSIGN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELEGATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SETOUTCOME"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="presentationDataTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines the diffent types of data that presentations can be applied to.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="TASK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PROCESS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema jaxb:version="1.0" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/taskQuery" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/taskQuery" xmlns:common="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/common" xmlns:jaxb="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb" xmlns:task="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/task"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <jaxb:schemaBindings> <jaxb:package name="oracle.bpel.services.workflow.query.model"/> </jaxb:schemaBindings> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/task" schemaLocation="http://soa-server:7003//integration/services/TaskQueryService/TaskQueryService?XSD=WorkflowTask.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="taskPredicateQuery" type="taskPredicateQueryType"/> <xsd:complexType name="taskPredicateQueryType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="presentationId" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ID of presnetation that will define the columns, optional info and ordering for this query. If presentationId is specified, then displayColumnList, optionalInfoList and ordering elements should NOT be specified.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="displayColumnList" type="displayColumnType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="optionalInfoList" type="taskOptionalInfoType" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="predicate" type="taskPredicateType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ordering" type="taskOrderingType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specifies how tasks returned by the query should be ordered. If a presentationId has been specified, then the ordering defined in that presentation will be used, and this element should NOT be used.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="startRow" type="xsd:positiveInteger"/> <xsd:attribute name="endRow" type="xsd:positiveInteger"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="taskAggregateQuery" type="taskAggregateQueryType"/> <xsd:complexType name="taskAggregateQueryType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="groupByColumn" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="predicate" type="taskPredicateType"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="orderByCount" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:attribute name="ascendingOrder" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="viewTaskPredicateQuery" type="viewTaskPredicateQueryType"/> <xsd:complexType name="viewTaskPredicateQueryType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="viewId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="predicate" type="taskPredicateType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Deprecated. Use extraPredicate instead.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="extraPredicate" type="predicateType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="ordering" type="taskOrderingType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="startRow" type="xsd:positiveInteger"/> <xsd:attribute name="endRow" type="xsd:positiveInteger"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="viewTaskAggregateQuery" type="viewTaskAggregateQueryType"/> <xsd:complexType name="viewTaskAggregateQueryType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="viewId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="defaultGroupByColumn" minOccurs="1" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="extraPredicate" minOccurs="0" type="predicateType"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="defaultOrderByCount" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:attribute name="defaultAscendingOrder" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="taskErrorQuery" type="taskErrorPredicateQueryType"/> <xsd:complexType name="taskErrorPredicateQueryType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="predicate" type="predicateType"/> <xsd:element name="ordering" type="taskOrderingType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="startRow" type="xsd:positiveInteger"/> <xsd:attribute name="endRow" type="xsd:positiveInteger"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="displayColumnType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="displayColumn" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="taskOptionalInfoType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="taskOptionalInfo" type="taskOptionalInfoEnum" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="taskPredicateType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="assignmentFilter" type="assignmentFilterEnum" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="keywords" type="xsd:string" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="clause" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="predicateClauseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>clause element is deprecated. Use predicate element instead</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="predicate" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" type="predicateType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="predicateClauseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This type is deprecatd. Use clauseType instead.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="column" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="operator" type="predicateOperationEnum"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="dateValue" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="valueList" type="valueListType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="joinOperator" type="predicateJoinOperatorEnum"/> <xsd:attribute name="ignoreCase" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="clauseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="column" type="columnType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="operator" type="predicateOperationEnum"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="dateValue" maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element name="valueList" type="valueListType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="columnValue" type="columnType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="identityTypeValue" type="task:identityType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="identityTypeValueList" type="identityTypeValueListType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="joinOperator" type="predicateJoinOperatorEnum"/> <xsd:attribute name="ignoreCase" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="predicate" type="predicateType"/> <xsd:complexType name="predicateType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:element name="lhs" type="predicateType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="logicalOperator" type="predicateJoinOperatorEnum" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="rhs" type="predicateType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="clause" type="clauseType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="columnType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="columnName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="tableName" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="valueListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="identityTypeValueListType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="value" type="task:identityType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="taskOrderingType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="clause" type="orderingClauseType" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="orderingClauseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="column" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="table" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The name of the table to which the ordering clause column belongs. Field is optional only for backwards compatibility, and a value should be specified if a value is specified for the column field. If no value is specfied, the table name will be defaulted, depending on the context the ordering clause is used - but usually, the default table name will be WFTask.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="aggregateColumnAlias" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If the column being ordered on is an aggregate column, there is no corresponding column and table name. Instead, the aggregate column must be aliased, and the ordering clause must use this alias.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="sortOrder" type="sortOrderEnum" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="nullFirst" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="taskCountType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="count" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="predicateOperationEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="EQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NEQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GTE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LTE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LIKE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT_LIKE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT_IN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CONTAINS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT_CONTAINS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BEGINS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT_BEGINS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ENDS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT_ENDS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BEFORE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AFTER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ON"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NEXT_N_DAYS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LAST_N_DAYS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IS_IN_FUTURE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IS_IN_PAST"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IS_NULL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IS_NOT_NULL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="predicateJoinOperatorEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="AND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="sortOrderEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ASCENDING"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DESCENDING"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="assignmentFilterEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="All"/> <xsd:enumeration value="My"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Group"/> <xsd:enumeration value="My+Group"/> <xsd:enumeration value="My+Group+All"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Reportees"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Creator"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Owner"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Previous"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Admin"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="taskOptionalInfoEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Actions"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GroupActions"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CustomActions"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Attachments"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Comments"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Payload"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ShortHistory"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TemplateTasks"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ACTION_DISPLAY_NAME"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TASK_VIEW_CONTEXT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/taskQueryService" jaxb:version="1.0" elementFormDefault="qualified" name="oracle.bpel.services.workflow.query.model"/> </jaxb:schemaBindings> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/common" schemaLocation="http://soa-server:7003//integration/services/TaskQueryService/TaskQueryService?XSD=WorkflowCommon.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/task" schemaLocation="http://soa-server:7003//integration/services/TaskQueryService/TaskQueryService?XSD=WorkflowTask.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/bpel/workflow/taskQuery" schemaLocation="http://soa-server:7003//integration/services/TaskQueryService/TaskQueryService?XSD=TaskSequenceChanges.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="credentialOnBehalfOfRequest" type="tns:credentialOnBehalfOfRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="workflowContextRequest" type="tns:workflowContextRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="updateWorkflowContextRequest" type="tns:updateWorkflowContextRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="taskListRequest" type="tns:taskListRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="queryAggregatedTasksRequest" type="tns:queryAggregatedTasksRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="countTasksRequest" type="tns:countTasksRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="doesTaskExistRequest" type="tns:countTasksRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="queryViewTasksRequest" type="tns:queryViewTasksRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="queryViewAggregatedTasksRequest" type="tns:queryViewAggregatedTasksRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="countViewTasksRequest" type="tns:countViewTasksRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="doesViewTaskExistRequest" type="tns:countViewTasksRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="queryDecomposedTasksRequest" type="tns:queryDecomposedTasksRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="queryTaskErrorsRequest" type="tns:queryTaskErrorsRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="taskHistoryRequest" type="tns:taskHistoryRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="taskDetailsByIdRequest" type="tns:taskDetailsByIdRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="taskDetailsByNumberRequest" type="tns:taskDetailsByNumberRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="taskVersionDetailsRequest" type="tns:taskVersionDetailsRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="getPermittedAssigneesRequest" type="tns:getPermittedAssigneesRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="getPermittedAssigneesForTasksRequest" type="tns:getPermittedAssigneesForTasksRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="getTaskSequenceRequest" type="tns:getTaskSequenceRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="taskQueryServiceFaultResponse" type="tns:taskQueryServiceFaultType"/> <xsd:element name="taskListResponse" type="tns:taskListResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="aggregatedTasksResponse" type="tns:aggregatedTasksResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="taskCountResponse" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="taskExistsResponse" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="getPermittedAssigneesResponse" type="tns:getPermittedAssigneesResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="getPermittedAssigneesForTasksResponse" type="tns:getPermittedAssigneesForTasksResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="taskErrorsResponse" type="tns:taskErrorsResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="successResponse" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="filter" type="tns:FilterType"/> <xsd:element name="filterPredicate" type="tns:FilterPredicateType"/> <xsd:simpleType name="LogicalOperatorEnumType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="AND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="OR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="UnaryOperatorEnumType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="NOT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="OperatorEnumType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="EQUAL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTEQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MORE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MOREEQ"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EQLESS"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="FilterType"> <xsd:choice maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:element ref="tns:filter"/> <xsd:element ref="tns:filterPredicate"/> </xsd:choice> <xsd:attribute name="unaryOperator" type="tns:UnaryOperatorEnumType" use="optional" fixed="NOT"/> <xsd:attribute name="logicalOperator" type="tns:LogicalOperatorEnumType" use="optional" default="AND"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="FilterPredicateType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="operator" type="tns:OperatorEnumType"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="credentialOnBehalfOfRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="common:workflowContext"/> <xsd:element name="onBehalfOfUser" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="workflowContextRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="token" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="updateWorkflowContextRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="common:workflowContext"/> <xsd:element name="attribute" type="tns:attributeType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="force" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="attributeType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:string"
